abilities.name: Sadism
abilities.description: Alarak deals 100% more Ability damage versus enemy Heroes.

abilities.name: Discord Strike
abilities.description: After a 0.5 second delay, enemies in front of Alarak take 384 (182 + 4% per level) damage and are silenced for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Telekinesis
abilities.description: Create a force, pushing yourself and all enemies hit from the targeted point towards the targeted direction. Deals 106 (50 + 4% per level) damage to enemies.

abilities.name: Lightning Surge
abilities.description: Deal 210 (100 + 4% per level) damage to an enemy and all enemies between you and the target. 75% of the damage dealt to enemy Heroes is returned as health.

abilities.name: Deadly Charge
abilities.description: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 439 (208 + 4% per level) damage to all enemies in the path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.625 seconds. Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

abilities.name: Unleash Deadly Charge
abilities.description: Unleash your Deadly Charge.Issuing a move order while this is channeling will cancel the cast at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

abilities.name: Counter-Strike
abilities.description: Alarak becomes Protected and channels for 1 second. If an enemy Hero attacked Alarak during that time, Alarak sends a shockwave forward that deals 579 (275 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Timewalker
abilities.description: You've traveled to the future, and as such, will learn your Talents 1 level earlier  than your teammates!

abilities.name: Sand Blast
abilities.description: After 1 second, fire a missile that deals 855 (406 + 4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit.

abilities.name: Dragon's Breath
abilities.description: Fire a blast into the air that lands after 1.5 seconds, dealing 965 (458 + 4% per level) damage to enemies in an area. Enemies cannot see where the blast will land.

abilities.name: Time Trap
abilities.description: Place a Time Trap that arms and Stealths after 2 seconds. The first enemy Hero to touch it will be put into Stasis for 2 seconds. Only 1 trap can exist at once.

abilities.name: Slowing Sands
abilities.description: Mana: 2 per secondPlace a sand vortex that greatly slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active the more it slows, up to 60% after 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Temporal Loop
abilities.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where you cast Temporal Loop on them.

abilities.name: Tailwind
abilities.description: Gain 20% increased Movement Speed after not taking damage for 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Hammerang
abilities.description: Throw out a Hammer that returns to you, dealing 290 (138 + 4% per level) damage and slowing enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.description: Deal 235 (112 + 4% per level) to an enemy, and an additional 165 (78 + 4% per level) damage per second for 4.25 seconds if you remain close to the target.

abilities.name: Barrel Roll
abilities.description: Dashes forward and grants a 375 (178 + 4% per level) point Shield for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Mighty Gust
abilities.description: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Hinterland Blast
abilities.description: After a short delay, deal 901 (428 + 4% per level) damage to enemies within a long line.

abilities.name: Two-Headed
abilities.description: Permanently attached to Cho, going where he goes. You are immune to Stun and Silence effects.

abilities.name: Shadowflame
abilities.description: Deal 391 (155 + 5% per level) damage to enemies in the area.

abilities.name: Dread Orb
abilities.description: Throw a bomb that will bounce three times, dealing 393 (156 + 5% per level) damage to enemies.

abilities.name: Runic Blast
abilities.description: Detonate Cho's Rune Bomb, dealing 601 (285 + 4% per level) damage around it.

abilities.name: Detonate Twisting Nether
abilities.description: Detonate the Twisting Nether, dealing 750 (356 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Twisting Nether
abilities.description: After 1 second, nearby enemies are slowed by 40% while you channel, up to 5 seconds. Activate to deal 750 (356 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Shadow Bolt Volley
abilities.description: After 1 second, unleash 19.375 Shadow Bolts over 3.875 seconds, each dealing 226 (108 + 4% per level) damage to the first target hit. The bolts fire towards your mouse.

abilities.name: Curse of the Worgen
abilities.description: Use certain Abilities to shapeshift between a Human and a Worgen.While Human, your Basic Attack is ranged.While Worgen, your Basic Attack is melee but deals 40% more damage.

abilities.name: Razor Swipe
abilities.description: Swipe towards the area in front of you for 349 (166 + 4% per level) damage. Human: Gilnean CocktailDamage the first enemy hit and deal heavy damage behind them.

abilities.name: Gilnean Cocktail
abilities.description: Hurl a flask that deals 130 (62 + 4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit and explodes for 518 (246 + 4% per level) damage to enemies in a cone behind them. Worgen: Razor SwipeSwipe forward and damage enemies you pass through.

abilities.name: Inner Beast
abilities.description: Gain 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh this duration.

abilities.name: Disengage
abilities.description: Roll away and shapeshift into a Human. Human: DarkflightLeap at an enemy and shapeshift into a Worgen.

abilities.name: Darkflight
abilities.description: Shapeshift into a Worgen and leap at an enemy dealing 193 (92 + 4% per level) damage. Worgen: DisengageRoll away and shapeshift into a Human.

abilities.name: Go for the Throat
abilities.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing 3 times for 921 (437 + 4% per level) total damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

abilities.name: Marked for the Kill
abilities.description: Shapeshift into a Human and fire a shot hitting the first enemy Hero in its path for 149 (71 + 4% per level) damage. For 5 seconds, they are Vulnerable, taking 25% more damage. Each time you deal damage to the Vulnerable Hero, the duration is refreshed.

abilities.name: Life Tap
abilities.description: Gul'dan does not regenerate Mana. Activate to restore 25% mana.

abilities.name: Fel Flame
abilities.description: Release a wave of flame, dealing 483 (209 + 4.5% per level) damage to enemies.

abilities.name: Drain Life
abilities.description: Drain the life from an enemy over 3 seconds, dealing 290 (138 + 4% per level) damage per second and healing Gul'dan for 377 (179 + 4% per level) Health per second.

abilities.name: Corruption
abilities.description: Call forth three bursts of shadow energy, dealing 492 (214 + 4.5% per level) damage over 6 seconds. Stacks 3 times.

abilities.name: Horrify
abilities.description: After a short delay, deal 263 (125 + 4% per level) damage and fear enemy Heroes in the area for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Rain of Destruction
abilities.description: Summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 362 (172 + 4% per level) damage in a small area.

abilities.name: Betrayer's Thirst
abilities.description: Basic Attacks heal for 30% of damage dealt and reduce your Ability cooldowns by 1 second.

abilities.name: Dive
abilities.description: Dive at the target, dealing 145 (69 + 4% per level) damage and flipping to the other side of the target.

abilities.name: Sweeping Strike
abilities.description: Dash towards target point, dealing 261 (124 + 4% per level) damage to enemies along the way.Enemy heroes hit increase your Basic Attack damage by 35% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Evasion
abilities.description: Evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: The Hunt
abilities.description: Charge to target unit, dealing 550 (262 + 4% per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

abilities.name: Metamorphosis
abilities.description: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 101 (48 + 4% per level) damage in the area. Temporarily increase your maximum Health by 439 (208 + 4% per level) for each Hero hit. Lasts for 18 seconds.

abilities.name: Frostbite
abilities.description: All abilities Chill targets, slowing Movement Speed by 25% and amplifying damage from your abilities by 50%. Lasts 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Frostbolt
abilities.description: Deal 351 (167 + 4% per level) damage and Chill the target.

abilities.name: Blizzard
abilities.description: Bombard an area with 3 waves of ice, dealing 312 (148 + 4% per level) damage each. Damaged enemies are Chilled.

abilities.name: Cone of Cold
abilities.description: Deal 504 (204 + 4% per level) damage and Chill targets.

abilities.name: Ring of Frost
abilities.description: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 680 (323 + 4% per level) damage and roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

abilities.name: Summon Water Elemental
abilities.description: Summons a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks do 171 (82 + 4% per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.

abilities.name: Verdant Spheres
abilities.description: Activate to make your next Basic Ability more powerful.

abilities.name: Flamestrike
abilities.description: After 1 second, deal 702 (302 + 4% per level) damage in an area. Verdant Spheres increases the radius by 50%.

abilities.name: Living Bomb
abilities.description: Deal 553 (252 + 4% per level) damage over 3 seconds to an enemy, then they explode dealing 303 (138 + 4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies. Other Heroes damaged by this explosion are also affected by Living Bomb, though the secondary explosions cannot spread. Verdant Spheres makes this Ability cost no Mana and have no cooldown.

abilities.name: Gravity Lapse
abilities.description: Stun the first enemy hit for 1 seconds. Verdant Spheres causes Gravity Lapse to stun the first 3 enemies hit and increases the stun duration by 50%.

abilities.name: Pyroblast
abilities.description: After 2 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 2150 (851 + 4% per level) damage to an enemy Hero and 1075 (426 + 4% per level) damage to enemies nearby.

abilities.name: Phoenix
abilities.description: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 171 (82 + 4% per level) damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 171 (82 + 4% per level) damage and splashing for 50%.

abilities.name: Assimilation
abilities.description: Gain 10% of damage dealt from Basic Attacks and Abilities as Shields for 6 seconds. Shield amount gained doubled against Heroes.Current maximum: 2200 (1045 + 4% per level)

abilities.name: Ravage
abilities.description: Leap to a target, dealing 500 (238 + 4% per level) damage. If this kills the target, its cooldown is instantly reset.

abilities.name: Impaling Blades
abilities.description: After 1.25 seconds, deal 550 (262 + 4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area, stunning them for 1 second.

abilities.name: Primal Grasp
abilities.description: Pulls enemies within the target area towards you, dealing 242 (115 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Summon Ultralisk
abilities.description: Summon an Ultralisk that attacks the target to deal 200 (95 + 4% per level) damage. Attacks splash to nearby enemies for 50% damage. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Ultralisk. Lasts for 20 seconds.

abilities.name: Maelstrom
abilities.description: Deals 180 (86 + 4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.

abilities.name: Critical Mass
abilities.description: Getting a Takedown will refresh the cooldown on all of your Abilities.

abilities.name: Magic Missiles
abilities.description: Fire three missiles toward an area, each dealing 266 (151 + 3% per level) damage to the first enemy hit.

abilities.name: Arcane Orb
abilities.description: Fire an orb that powers up as it travels, dealing 244 (135 + 3% per level) damage to the first enemy hit. The amount of damage dealt is increased the further it travels, up to 732 (405 + 3% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Teleport
abilities.description: Teleport a short distance instantly.

abilities.name: Disintegrate
abilities.description: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 467 (185 + 5% per level) damage per second to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

abilities.name: Wave of Force
abilities.description: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 425 (168 + 5% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Nature's Toxin
abilities.description: Your Basic Attacks and damaging Abilities poison their target, dealing 71 (34 + 4% per level) damage a second for 3 seconds. Every additional application increases the duration by 3 seconds, up to a maximum of 9 seconds.

abilities.name: Noxious Blossom
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, cause an area to explode with pollen dealing 351 (167 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Crippling Spores
abilities.description: Enemies currently afflicted by Nature's Toxin have its duration increased by 3 seconds and are slowed by 40% decaying over 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Relocate Wisp
abilities.description: Orders your Wisp to move to a new location.

abilities.name: Wisp
abilities.description: Spawn a Wisp to scout an area. Can be redirected once active. Lasts 45 seconds.

abilities.name: Thornwood Vine
abilities.description: Send forth vines that deal 360 (171 + 4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. Can hold 3 charges.

abilities.name: Leaping Strike
abilities.description: Leap over an enemy, slowing them by 80% for 0.35 seconds and attacking for 594 (286 + 4% per level) damage. Has 2 charges.

abilities.name: Permanent Cloak, Sniper
abilities.description: Gain Stealth when out of combat for 3 seconds. Taking damage, attacking, using Abilities, or channeling reveals you.Basic Attack range is 20% further than other ranged Heroes, and you see 10% further than other Heroes.

abilities.name: Snipe
abilities.description: Deals 588 (279 + 4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit.

abilities.name: Pinning Shot
abilities.description: Deal 242 (115 + 4% per level) damage to an enemy and slow it by 30% for 2.25 seconds.

abilities.name: Holo Decoy
abilities.description: Create a Decoy for 5 seconds that appears to attack enemies. Using this Ability does not break Cloak.

abilities.name: Triple Tap
abilities.description: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 741 (352 + 4% per level) damage each.

abilities.name: Precision Strike
abilities.description: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 1000 (475 + 4% per level) damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

abilities.name: Advanced Optics
abilities.description: Basic Attack range is 20% further than other ranged Heroes, and you see 10% further than other Heroes.

abilities.name: Penetrating Round
abilities.description: Deals 526 (250 + 4% per level) damage and knocks enemies back.

abilities.name: Inspire
abilities.description: Gain 30% bonus Attack Speed for 6 seconds. Nearby allies gain half of the bonus.

abilities.name: Adrenaline Rush
abilities.description: Automatically activates to heal for 965 (458 + 4% per level) when you are below 30% Health.

abilities.name: Hyperion
abilities.description: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run dealing 145 (69 + 4% per level) damage a second, hitting up to 4 enemies. Also occasionally fires its Yamato Cannon on Structures for 1740 (826 + 4% per level) damage. Lasts 12 seconds.

abilities.name: Raynor's Raiders
abilities.description: Summon two Stealthed Banshees that attack an enemy. Each Banshee deals 95 (45 + 4% per level) damage a second and lasts 22 seconds. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Banshees.

abilities.name: Advancing Strikes
abilities.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase your Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Mirror Image
abilities.description: Create 2 Mirror Images that deal 30% of your damage and have 50% of your current Health. Images last up to 16 seconds, and only two can be active at any one time.

abilities.name: Critical Strike
abilities.description: Your next Basic Attack within 8 seconds will be a Critical Strike, dealing 50% increased damage. This also applies to Images, and does not break Wind Walk.Passive: You and your Images deal a Critical Strike on every 4th Basic Attack.

abilities.name: Wind Walk
abilities.description: Enter Stealth for up to 7.94 seconds or until you attack, use an Ability, or take damage. While Stealthed, your Movement Speed is increased by 30% and you can pass through other units.Damage taken within the first 1 second will not break Wind Walk.

abilities.name: Bladestorm
abilities.description: Become an Unstoppable whirlwind of death, dealing 548 (260 + 4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Illusion Master
abilities.description: Switch places with the target Mirror Image.Passive: You can control Mirror Images separately or as a group, and they deal an additional 20% of your damage.

abilities.name: Fresh Meat
abilities.description: Quest: Nearby Minions drop 1 Fresh Meat and Heroes drop 5 Fresh Meat when they die. You can pick up Fresh Meat to gain 1 Basic Attack damage per Meat. Can hold up to 125 Meat. You drop up to 10 Fresh Meat upon dying. Reward: After acquiring 125 pieces of Fresh Meat, gain and additional 100 Basic Attack damage and 25% increased Attack Speed. You also no longer lose Fresh Meat on death.

abilities.name: Hamstring
abilities.description: Deal 242 (115 + 4% per level) damage and slow enemies by 49.92% fading over 2 seconds.  Your next Basic Attack will strike immediately.

abilities.name: Butcher's Brand
abilities.description: Deal 82 (39 + 4% per level) damage to an enemy and cause your Basic Attacks against them to heal you for 75% of the damage done for 5 seconds. Healing doubled versus Heroes. Last 4 seconds. Your Basic Attacks against a branded Hero increase the duration by 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Ruthless Onslaught
abilities.description: Charge at an enemy, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed. If you reach the target, they are stunned for 1 second and take 261 (124 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Furnace Blast
abilities.description: After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around you dealing 1096 (520 + 4% per level) damage to enemies.Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

abilities.name: Lamb to the Slaughter
abilities.description: Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay.  This deals 375 (178 + 4% per level) damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Frostwolf Resilience
abilities.description: Dealing damage with Abilities grants 1 stack of Frostwolf Resilience. At 5 stacks, you are instantly healed for 660 (314 + 4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: Chain Lightning
abilities.description: Deal 391 (186 + 4% per level) damage to an enemy and half that amount to 2 nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Feral Spirit
abilities.description: Send out a Feral Spirit that deals 336 (160 + 4% per level) damage to enemies in its path. Upon hitting an enemy Hero, the wolf stops and roots that hero in place for 1 second.

abilities.name: Windfury
abilities.description: Increase your Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds. Your next 3 Basic Attacks occur 100% faster.

abilities.name: Sundering
abilities.description: After a short delay, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 601 (285 + 4% per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

abilities.name: Earthquake
abilities.description: Summon a massive Earthquake that periodically slows enemies in the area by 70%. Lasts for 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Reload
abilities.description: You can Basic Attack while moving, and after attacking 10 times you need to reload over 0.75 seconds. You can manually reload early by activating Reload.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Dash towards an area. Stores 3 charges.

abilities.name: Melee
abilities.description: Deal 557 (265 + 4% per level) damage to a nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes. Gain 5% Pulse Bomb charge when damaging an enemy, and 10% against Heroes.

abilities.name: Recall
abilities.description: Return to the position you were at 3 seconds ago, refill your ammo, and remove all negative status effects from yourself.

abilities.name: Pulse Bomb
abilities.description: Fire a short range bomb that attaches to enemy units if you hit them. The bomb explodes after 1.5 seconds dealing 1226 (444 + 5.5% per level) damage to them and 613 (222 + 5.5% per level) damage to other nearby enemies.This Ability is slowly charged over time by dealing damage to enemies with Basic Attacks and Melee.

abilities.name: Minigun
abilities.description: Activate to have your Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2% of their maximum Health.  Lasts 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Annihilate
abilities.description: Fire the Odin's cannons in a straight line, dealing 430 (204 + 4% per level) damage to everything in the path.

abilities.name: Overkill
abilities.description: Deal 1414 (671 + 4% per level) damage to the target and 691 (328 + 4% per level) damage to nearby targets over 4 seconds. Reactivate to select a new target. Can move and use Abilities while channeling.

abilities.name: Ragnarok Missiles
abilities.description: Launches a volley of missiles at target area, dealing 290 (138 + 4% per level) damage and slowing enemy Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Frag Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals 561 (267 + 4% per level) damage, knocking enemies away.

abilities.name: Thrusters
abilities.description: Dash in target direction.

abilities.name: Run and Gun
abilities.description: Dash a short distance.

abilities.name: Drakken Laser Drill
abilities.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 312 (148 + 4% per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

abilities.name: Commandeer Odin
abilities.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 60% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. Lasts 23 seconds.

abilities.name: Hatred
abilities.description: Basic Attacks grant a stack of Hatred, up to 10. Each Hatred stack increases Basic Attack damage by 8% and Movement Speed by 1%. Last 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Hungering Arrow
abilities.description: Fire an arrow that deals 307 (146 + 4% per level) damage to the first target hit, then seeks up to 2 additional enemies dealing 176 (84 + 4% per level) damage. Can hit an enemy multiple times.

abilities.name: Multishot
abilities.description: Deal 360 (171 + 4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area.

abilities.name: Vault
abilities.description: Dash to the target area. Your next Basic Attack within 2 second deals 5% increased damage per stack of Hatred.

abilities.name: Strafe
abilities.description: Rapidly attack nearby visible enemies for 132 (63 + 4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing heroes over minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Rain of Vengeance
abilities.description: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 493 (234 + 4% per level) damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds. Stores 2 charges.

abilities.name: Permanent Cloak
abilities.description: Gain Stealth when out of combat for 3 seconds. Taking damage, attacking, using Abilities, or channeling reveals you.

abilities.name: Cleave
abilities.description: Deal 415 (197 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Singularity Spike
abilities.description: Flings a Singularity Spike that sticks to the first enemy hit. Deals 500 (238 + 4% per level) damage after 1 second and slows the enemy by 40% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Teleport to the target location. Using this Ability does not break cloak.

abilities.name: Shadow Assault
abilities.description: Your Basic Attacks cause you to charge at enemies and have 20% increased Attack Speed. Lasts for 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Void Prison
abilities.description: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, making allies and enemies invulnerable and unable to act for 5 seconds. You are not affected.

abilities.name: Locust Strain
abilities.description: Spawns a Locust to attack down the nearest lane every 15 seconds. Locusts last for 25 seconds.

abilities.name: Symbiote
abilities.description: Assist another allied Unit or Combat Structure, allowing you to shield them and use new Abilities.Cannot be used on another Hero's Summons.

abilities.name: Stab
abilities.description: Shoots a spike towards target area that deals 237 (113 + 4% per level) damage to the first enemy it contacts.

abilities.name: Toxic Nest
abilities.description: Spawn a mine that becomes active after a short time. Deals 336 (160 + 4% per level) damage and reveals the enemy for 4 seconds. Lasts 90 seconds.

abilities.name: Spike Burst
abilities.description: Deals 233 (111 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Carapace
abilities.description: Shields the assisted ally for 301 (143 + 4% per level). Lasts for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Evolve Monstrosity Active
abilities.description: You currently have a Monstrosity active

abilities.name: Evolve Monstrosity
abilities.description: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries near the Monstrosity die, it gains 5% Health and 5% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity takes 50% less damage from Minions and Structures.Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows you to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.

abilities.name: Ultimate Evolution
abilities.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Ability Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

abilities.name: General of Hell
abilities.description: Summon a Demon Lieutenant at an allied Mercenary, Minion, or Summon. The Lieutenant will march with the target, granting 15% increased damage and 15% increased maximum Health to all nearby friendly Mercenaries, Minions, and Summons. Unlimited range.

abilities.name: Globe Of Annihilation
abilities.description: Shoot a globe of destruction, dealing 360 (171 + 4% per level) damage on impact.  Long range.

abilities.name: Summon Demon Warrior
abilities.description: Spawn a Demon Warrior that marches toward a point. Warriors deal 82 (39 + 4% per level) damage per second and last for 10.5 seconds.

abilities.name: All Shall Burn
abilities.description: Mana: 16 per secondChannel a death beam on an enemy dealing 220 (104 + 4% per level) damage a second. The damage amount grows the longer it is channeled, to a maximum of 439 (208 + 4% per level) damage per second.  Does 25% more damage to Structures.

abilities.name: Black Pool
abilities.description: Create a pool that empowers Azmodan, his Demons, and allied Minions, increasing their attack and ability damage by 75%. Pools last 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Demonic Invasion
abilities.description: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 121 (58 + 4% per level) damage per impact. Demon Grunts deal 60 (29 + 4% per level) damage and have 800 (380 + 4% per level) health.Damage is doubled versus non-Heroic targets.

abilities.name: Salvager
abilities.description: Destroyed enemy Structures and your Rock-it! Turrets drop scrap. Collecting scrap restores 30 Mana and causes your Abilities to recharge three times as fast over 3.07 seconds. Activate Salvager to dismantle a traget Rock-it! Turret and turn it into Scrap.

abilities.name: Rock-It! Turret
abilities.description: Creates a turret that deals 149 (71 + 4% per level) damage. Lasts for 30 seconds.

abilities.name: Deth Lazor
abilities.description: Charged attack that deals 301 (143 + 4% per level) damage to enemies in a line. Damage and range increase the longer the Ability is charged, up to 100% after 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Xplodium Charge
abilities.description: Places a bomb that deals 511 (243 + 4% per level) ddamage to enemies within target area after 2.5 seconds, stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Robo-Goblin
abilities.description: Basic Attacks deal an additional 150% damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Structures.

abilities.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000
abilities.description: After a 2 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 550 (262 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Raven Form
abilities.description: Instead of mounting, Medivh can transform into a raven, increasing Movement Speed by 20%. While transformed, Medivh can see and fly over all terrain and is immune to all effects.

abilities.name: Arcane Rift
abilities.description: Launch a rift that deals 208 (190 + 4% per level) damage to enemies in its path. If an enemy Hero is hit, reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds and refund 50 Mana.

abilities.name: Force of Will
abilities.description: Protect an allied Hero from all damage for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Portal
abilities.description: Create a set of portals between you and the target location, allowing allies to teleport between both. The portals last 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Poly Bomb
abilities.description: Polymorph an enemy Hero, suppressing their attacks and Silencing them for 2 seconds. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

abilities.name: Ley Line Seal
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that imprisons enemy Heroes in Stasis for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Spawn Egg
abilities.description: Place an Egg at target location, revealing the nearby area. Upon dying, you respawn at the Egg after 5 seconds.  If your egg is killed, you are revealed to enemies for 15 seconds. You only grant 25% of a Hero's experience upon dying.

abilities.name: Slime
abilities.description: Deal 180 (86 + 4% per level) damage and applies Slime on nearby enemies for 8 seconds, slowing enemies by 20%. Does 450 (214 + 4% per level) damage to enemies who are already Slimed.

abilities.name: Pufferfish
abilities.description: Spit out a Pufferfish at the target point. After 3 seconds, the fish will blow up for 855 (406 + 4% per level) damage. Enemies can attack the fish to prevent it from exploding.

abilities.name: Safety Bubble
abilities.description: Becomes Invulnerable for 2 seconds. While active, you cannot attack or use abilities.

abilities.name: March of the Murlocs
abilities.description: Command a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 209 (99 + 0% per level) damage and slow its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Does half damage to Structures.

abilities.name: Octo-Grab
abilities.description: Summon an octopus to stun target enemy Hero for 3.06 seconds while you hit them for 1 damage a second.

abilities.name: Voodoo Ritual
abilities.description: Your Basic Attacks and Abilities poison Non-Heroic enemies, causing them to take 145 (69 + 0% per level) additional damage over 6 seconds. If a Minion dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, you permanently gain 4 Health and 1 Mana. Bonus Health: 4. Bonus Mana: 1.

abilities.name: Corpse Spiders
abilities.description: Hurl a jar of spiders that deals 110 (52 + 4% per level) damage. If it hits at least one enemy, create 3 Corpse Spiders that attack for 77 (37 + 4% per level) damage. Spiders last for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Zombie Wall
abilities.description: After 1 second, create a ring of Zombies surrounding the target area that deal 62 (30 + 4% per level) damage and last for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Plague of Toads
abilities.description: Create 5 Toads that deal 277 (132 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Gargantuan Stomp
abilities.description: Order your Gargantuan to stomp, dealing 331 (158 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Gargantuan
abilities.description: Summon a Gargantuan that guards you for 20 seconds. Deals 331 (158 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies when summoned, attacks for 428 (203 + 4% per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp.

abilities.name: Ravenous Spirit
abilities.description: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 412 (196 + 4% per level) damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Artillery
abilities.description: Basic Attacks deal 30% more damage to distant enemies.

abilities.name: Spider Mines
abilities.description: Create 3 mines that deal 211 (100 + 4% per level) damage and slow enemies by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Concussive Blast
abilities.description: Deals 309 (147 + 4% per level) damage and pushes enemies away.

abilities.name: Siege Mode
abilities.description: Become immobile to increase Basic Attack range by 90%, deal 25% splash damage, and deal 30% bonus damage to Minions and Structures.

abilities.name: Napalm Strike
abilities.description: Deals 360 (171 + 4% per level) damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 110 (52 + 4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Blunt Force Gun
abilities.description: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 800 (380 + 4% per level) damage to enemies in its path.

abilities.name: Black Arrows
abilities.description: Basic Attacks and Abilities stun Minions, Mercenaries, and Towers for 1 second.

abilities.name: Withering Fire
abilities.description: Shoot the closest enemy for 106 (50 + 4% per level) damage, preferring Heroes.  Stores 5 charges.Gain 1 charge on nearby enemy Minion or Mercenary deaths, and 3 charges on nearby enemy Hero deaths.

abilities.name: Shadow Dagger
abilities.description: Deals 82 (39 + 4% per level) damage and an additional 325 (154 + 4% per level) damage over 2 seconds to target unit. The effect spreads to nearby targets.

abilities.name: Haunting Wave
abilities.description: Send forth a wave of banshees dealing 250 (119 + 4% per level) damage to all targets. Reactivate to teleport to the banshees' location.

abilities.name: Wailing Arrow
abilities.description: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 500 (238 + 4% per level) damage and Silencing enemies in an area making them unable to use Abilities for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically when it reaches maximum range.

abilities.name: Mind Control
abilities.description: After 1 second cast, take control of an emeny Hero's movement and prevent them for doing anything else. Channel last 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Viking Hoard
abilities.description: Gathering a Regeneration Globe with a Viking permanently increases all their Health Regeneration by 0.5 per second.Current Bonus: 1.5 Regen per second

abilities.name: Mortar
abilities.description: Fires a mortar at the targeted location, dealing 450 (214 + 4% per level) damage in a large area.

abilities.name: Spin To Win!
abilities.description: Activate to have each Viking deal 222 (106 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Norse Force!
abilities.description: All Vikings gain a 242 (115 + 4% per level) to 483 (229 + 4% per level) point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Jump!
abilities.description: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Nordic Attack Squad
abilities.description: Activate to have all Viking Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1% of a Hero's maximum Health for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Viking Bribery
abilities.description: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near your Hero grant you stacks of Viking Bribery. Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum stacks available: 100.Current number of Viking Bribery stacks:

abilities.name: Play Again!
abilities.description: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds. Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

abilities.name: Longboat Raid!
abilities.description: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 246 (117 + 4% per level) damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 450 (214 + 4% per level) damage in an area.  The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

abilities.name: Raise Skeleton
abilities.description: When a nearby enemy Minion dies, it becomes a Skeletal Warrior that deals moderate damage and lasts up to 15 seconds. Up to 4 Skeletal Warriors can be active at once.

abilities.name: Bone Armor
abilities.description: Activate to gain a Shield equal to 25% of your maximum Health for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Spectral Scythe
abilities.description: Summon a scythe at target location that travels toward you after a 1-second delay, damaging enemies in its path.

abilities.name: Cursed Strikes
abilities.description: Once activated, your Basic Attacks over the next 4 seconds deal damage in a wide arc and reduce the Attack Speed of enemies hit by 50% for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Bone Prison
abilities.description: After a 2-second delay, root target enemy in place for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Poison Nova
abilities.description: After a short delay, release poisonous missiles that deal massive poison damage over 10 seconds to all enemies hit.

abilities.name: Skeletal Mages
abilities.description: Summon 4 Skeletal Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies and slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Lasts up to 15 seconds

abilities.name: Creep Tumor
abilities.description: Lay a Creep Tumor that generates Creep. While on Creep, Zagara gains 20% additional attack range and both Zagara and her summons move 20% faster. Tumors last 240 seconds.

abilities.name: Baneling Barrage
abilities.description: Launch 1 Baneling that deals 200 (95 + 4% per level) splash damage.

abilities.name: Hunter Killer
abilities.description: Summon a Hydralisk to attack a single target, dealing 149 (71 + 3% per level) damage per second. Lasts 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Infested Drop
abilities.description: Bombard target area with a Zerg Drop Pod for 300 (171 + 3% per level) damage. The pod spawns 2 Roachlings that deal 53 (30 + 3% per level) damage per second and last for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Devouring Maw
abilities.description: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 176 (84 + 3% per level) damage per second.Usable on Unstoppable enemies.

abilities.name: Nydus Network
abilities.description: Passive: Creep spreads 25% farther. Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack educes all of Zagara's cooldowns by 1 second. Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision of. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-cliking near it. While insde a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 9.75% Health and Mana per second.

abilities.name: Bestow Hope
abilities.description: Passive: 40% of the damage you deal to Heroes and 8% dealt to non-Heroes is stored as energy. Bestow an allied Hero with Hope. While they remain near you, damage they deal causes you to gain energy. You can only have Bestow Hope to 1 ally at time. You can store up to 1107 (526 + 4% per level) energy.

abilities.name: Sacred Sweep
abilities.description: Sweep the area with sacred power, dealing 176 (84 + 4% per level) damage to enemies and an additional 351 (167 + 4% per level) damage to enemies caught in the center.

abilities.name: Ray of Heaven
abilities.description: Consume your stored energy and heal allied Heroes in the area for the amount of energy consumed.

abilities.name: Detainment Strike
abilities.description: Deal 220 (104 + 4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and knock them back. If they collide with terrain, they are also stunned for 1.25 seconds and take an additional 220 (104 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Crystal Aegis
abilities.description: Place an allied Hero into Stasis for 2 seconds. Upon expiration, Crystal Aegis deals 592 (281 + 4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Resurrect
abilities.description: Channel on the spirit of a dead ally for 3 seconds, bringing them back to life with 50% of their maximum health at the location where they died.

abilities.name: Soothing Mist
abilities.description: Brightwing heals nearby allied Heroes for 252 (120 + 4% per level) every 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Arcane Flare
abilities.description: Deal 301 (143 + 4% per level) damage in a small area and 200 (95 + 4% per level) damage in a larger area.

abilities.name: Polymorph
abilities.description: Target is slowed by 20% Movement Speed, and cannot attack and is Silenced making them unable to use Abilities for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Pixie Dust
abilities.description: Increase targets Movement Speed by 20% and grants 2 charges of Block. Lasts 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Blink Heal
abilities.description: Teleport to a nearby ally, healing them for 447 (213 + 4% per level).  Can store 2 charges.

abilities.name: Emerald Wind
abilities.description: Create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 699 (332 + 4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away. Also passively increases the healing of Soothing Mist by 8%.

abilities.name: Iron Fists
abilities.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack deals 125% bonus damage.

abilities.name: Radiant Dash
abilities.description: Jump to an ally or enemy. Enemies are immediately hit with a Basic Attack.

abilities.name: Breath of Heaven
abilities.description: Heal nearby Heroes for 548 (260 + 4% per level) and give them 10% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Deadly Reach
abilities.description: Your next Basic Attack increases your Attack Speed and Attack Range by 100% for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Seven-Sided Strike
abilities.description: Become Invulnerable and strike 7 times over 1.81 seconds. Each strike hits the highest Health nearby Hero for 7% of their maximum Health.

abilities.name: Divine Palm
abilities.description: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for 2501 (1187 + 4% per level) if they take fatal damage in the next 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Fast Feet
abilities.description: Upon taking damage, gain 10% Movement Speed for 1 second.

abilities.name: Healing Brew
abilities.description: Heal lowest Health ally (prioritizing Heroes) for 430 (204 + 4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: Cloud Serpent
abilities.description: Summon a Cloud Serpent on target allied Hero that automatically attacks nearby enemies, doing 64 (31 + 4% per level) damage per attack. Heroes can only have 1 Cloud Serpent at a time. Lasts for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Blinding Wind
abilities.description: Throw a cloud of Blinding Wind at the 2 nearest enemies (prioritizing Heroes), dealing 290 (138 + 4% per level) damage. Affected targets miss all Basic Attacks for the next 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups
abilities.description: Rapidly tosses brew to the most injured nearby allies, prioritizing Heroes, restoring a total of 3576 (1698 + 4% per level) Health over 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Water Dragon
abilities.description: Summon a Water Dragon that after a delay hits the nearest enemy Hero and all enemies near them, dealing 697 (318 + 4% per level) damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Caduceus Reactor
abilities.description: Regenerate 3.12% of your maximum Health every second after not taking damage for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Redirect Healing Beam
abilities.description: Redirect Healing Beam to another target. Use on self to cancel channeling.

abilities.name: Healing Beam
abilities.description: Heal an ally for 421 (200 + 4% per level) health a second as long as they are in range. Reactivate to switch targets, or activate your Trait to cancel the channel.

abilities.name: Safeguard
abilities.description: Grant target ally Resistant, reducing damage taken by 25% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Displacement Grenade
abilities.description: Fire a grenade that explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing 461 (219 + 4% per level) damage, knocking enemies away.

abilities.name: Stim Drone
abilities.description: Grant an allied Hero 75% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Medivac Dropship
abilities.description: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to 10.5 seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.

abilities.name: Innervate
abilities.description: Grant allied Hero 20% of their maximum Mana over 5 seconds. While affected by Innervate, their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 50% faster.

abilities.name: Regrowth
abilities.description: Heal target ally for 329 (156 + 4% per level) Health instantly and an additional 1102 (523 + 4% per level) Health over 15 seconds.

abilities.name: Moonfire
abilities.description: Deal 231 (110 + 4% per level) damage to enemies within target area and reveals them for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Entangling Roots
abilities.description: Root enemies within the target area for 1.5 seconds, and deals 257 (122 + 4% per level) damage over the duration. Affected area grows over 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Tranquility
abilities.description: Heals 176 (84 + 4% per level) Health per second to nearby allies over 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Twilight Dream
abilities.description: After a short delay, deal 820 (389 + 4% per level) damage in a large area around you, silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds. Also passively increases your Mana Regeneration by 1.5.

abilities.name: Ghost Wolf
abilities.description: Instead of using a mount, you transform into a Ghost Wolf with 30% increased Movement Speed. Basic Attacks in Ghost Wolf cause you to lunge at your target and deal 75% bonus damage. Dealing damage, using Abilities, and channeling cancels Ghost Wolf form.

abilities.name: Chain Heal
abilities.description: Heal an ally for 816 (387 + 4% per level) Health, then heal up to two other nearby allies for 408 (194 + 4% per level) Health each.

abilities.name: Lightning Shield
abilities.description: Imbue an ally with lightning dealing 158 (75 + 4% per level) damage a second to nearby enemies. Last 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Earthbind Totem
abilities.description: Create a totem that slows nearby enemies by 35%.  The totem has 476 (226 + 4% per level) Health and lasts for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Bloodlust
abilities.description: Grant nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 30% Movement Speed. Lasts for 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Ancestral Healing
abilities.description: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 3401 (1615 + 4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: Oracle
abilities.description: Greatly increases your vision radius and allows you to detect enemy Heroes. Lasts for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Plasma Shield
abilities.description: Grant a Shield that absorbs 750 (356 + 4% per level) damage over 5 seconds. The Shield is 50% stronger when cast on another allied Hero.

abilities.name: Psionic Storm
abilities.description: Deal 242 (115 + 4% per level) damage per second to enemies in target area for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Dimensional Shift
abilities.description: Become invulnerable and fully invisible for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Archon
abilities.description: Transform into an Archon, gaining a 1000 (475 + 4% per level) point Shield, causing Basic Attacks to deal 244 (116 + 4% per level) damage and splash for 121 (58 + 4% per level) additional damage. Lasts for 12.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Force Wall
abilities.description: Create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Hunter's Mark
abilities.description: Make an enemy Vulnerable, increasing all damage taken by 25% and revealing them for 4 seconds.  Cannot be used on Structures.

abilities.name: Light of Elune
abilities.description: Heal yourself for 351 (162 + 4% per level).  If cast on an ally, also heals them for 702 (323 + 4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: Sentinel
abilities.description: Send an Owl that travels across the battleground revealing its path. Deals 380 (180 + 4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and reveals them for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Lunar Flare
abilities.description: After a short delay, deal 450 (214 + 4% per level) damage and stun enemies in the target area for 0.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Shadowstalk
abilities.description: Stealth all allied Heroes and heal them for 525 (240 + 4% per level) over 8 seconds.  At the conclusion of Shadowstalk, they receive a burst of 208 (95 + 4% per level) healing.

abilities.name: Starfall
abilities.description: Deal 200 (91 + 4% per level) damage per second and slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Eternal Devotion
abilities.description: Upon dying, become an Invulnerable spirit for up to 8 seconds. While in spirit form, you can heal allies with Flash of Light.

abilities.name: Holy Light
abilities.description: Heal an ally for 936 (445 + 4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: Flash of Light
abilities.description: Heal an ally for 531 (252 + 4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: Holy Radiance
abilities.description: Heal all allies in a line for 480 (228 + 4% per level) Health, dealing 351 (167 + 4% per level) damage to enemies.

abilities.name: Hammer of Justice
abilities.description: Deal 250 (119 + 4% per level) damage and stun the target for 1 second.

abilities.name: Divine Shield
abilities.description: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Divine Storm
abilities.description: Deal 410 (195 + 4% per level) damage and stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Scarab Host
abilities.description: Spawn a Beetle at your location whenever you use an ability. Beetles last for 8 seconds, attacking nearby enemies for 44 (21 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Impale
abilities.description: Deals 220 (104 + 4% per level) damage. Stuns for 1 second.

abilities.name: Harden Carapace
abilities.description: Gain a Shield that absorbs 570 (260 + 4% per level) damage over 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Burrow Charge
abilities.description: Burrows to location, dealing 235 (112 + 4% per level) damage and briefly stunning enemies in a small area upon surfacing. Can reactivate the Ability to surface early.

abilities.name: Locust Swarm
abilities.description: Deal 145 (69 + 4% per level) damage per second in an area around yourself. Each enemy damaged heals you for 40 (19 + 4% per level) Health. Lasts 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Cocoon
abilities.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 8 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

abilities.name: Shield Overload
abilities.description: If you take damage while below 50% Health, gain a 984 (467 + 4% per level) point Shield for 5 seconds. Your Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Shield Overload by 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Blade Dash
abilities.description: Dash forward and deal 125 (60 + 4% per level) damage to enemies, then return and deal 375 (178 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Twin Blades
abilities.description: Your next Basic Attack immediately causes you to charge a short distance and strike the enemy 2 times.

abilities.name: Phase Prism
abilities.description: Fire a Phase Prism that deals 145 (69 + 4% per level) damage to Heroes and swaps your position with theirs.

abilities.name: Purifier Beam
abilities.description: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 404 (192 + 4% per level) damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move.  Unlimited range.

abilities.name: Suppression Pulse
abilities.description: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 250 (119 + 4% per level) damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

abilities.name: Frostmourne Hungers
abilities.description: Activate to make your next Basic Attack strike immediately, do 100% increased damage, and restore 30 Mana.

abilities.name: Death Coil
abilities.description: Deals 360 (171 + 4% per level) damage to target enemy.Can be self-cast to heal for 522 (248 + 4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: Howling Blast
abilities.description: Root enemies within the target area for 1.5 seconds and deals 149 (71 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Frozen Tempest
abilities.description: Mana: 15 per secondDeals 106 (50 + 4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Slows enemy Move Speed by 6% per second, stacking up to 30%.

abilities.name: Army of the Dead
abilities.description: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 586 (278 + 4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: Summon Sindragosa
abilities.description: Deals 504 (240 + 4% per level) damage and slows enemies by 60% for 3.5 seconds.  Also disables non-Heroic enemies and Structures for 20 seconds.

abilities.name: Fortifying Brew
abilities.description: Drink from your keg, gaining 40 Brew and 465 (221 + 4% per level) temporary Shields per second, up to a maximum of 1394 (662 + 4% per level) while drinking. Shields persist for 2 seconds after you stop drinking.

abilities.name: Flying Kick
abilities.description: Kick through target enemy, dealing 246 (117 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Storm
abilities.description: Increase the Movement Speede of your spirits by 50% for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Keg Smash
abilities.description: Smash your keg, dealing 110 (52 + 4% per level) damage and drenching affected enemies in Brew, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Earth
abilities.description: Fire and Earth leap to the target location, slowing enemies in a large area by 70% for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Breath of Fire
abilities.description: Breathe a cone of flames, dealing 211 (100 + 4% per level) damage. Enemies soaked in Brew are set on fire, dealing 211 (100 + 4% per level) damage over 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Fire
abilities.description: Increase the Attack Speed of your spirits by 100% for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
abilities.description: Split into three elemental spirits for 12.15 seconds, each with 75% of your maximum Health and a unique ability. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well. Storm can grant your spirits Movement Speed. Earth can leap to an area and slow enemies. Fire can grant your spirits Attack Speed.

abilities.name: Wandering Keg
abilities.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel, dealing 130 (62 + 4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Two-Headed
abilities.description: Gall is permanently attached to you, going where you go.

abilities.name: Surging Fist
abilities.description: Activate to charge in a direction. Enemies in your path are knocked aside and take 101 (48 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Surging Fist
abilities.description: Wind up for at least 1 second temporarily slowing yourself, then reactivate to charge in a direction. Enemies in your path are knocked aside and take 101 (48 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Consuming Blaze
abilities.description: Ignite nearby enemies, dealing 294 (140 + 4% per level) damage over 3.94 seconds. If this hits an enemy, gain 596 (283 + 4% per level) Health over 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Rune Bomb
abilities.description: Roll a bomb dealing 200 (95 + 4% per level) damage to enemies in its path. Gall can use Runic Blast to detonate it to deal 601 (285 + 4% per level) damage in an area.

abilities.name: Hammer of Twilight
abilities.description: Passively increases Basic Attack damage by 25%. Activate to swing the Hammer to deal 377 (164 + 4.5% per level) damage, push enemies away, and stun for 0.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Upheaval
abilities.description: After 1 second pull enemies towards your direction, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 220 (104 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Essence Collection
abilities.description: Gain 10 Essence from Takedowns and 2 Essence from nearby Minions dying. Activate to consume all Essence and heal yourself for 64 (31 + 4% per level) Health over 5 seconds for each Essence stored. Maximum of 50 Essence. Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.

abilities.name: Drag
abilities.description: Lash out with your tongue, dealing 351 (167 + 4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit and dragging them with you for 1.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Dark Swarm
abilities.description: Deal 139 (63 + 4% per level) damage a second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds, and become able to move through units. Deals double damage to Heroes. Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.

abilities.name: Burrow
abilities.description: Burrow into the ground, entering Stasis and becoming Invulnerable for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Isolation
abilities.description: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 439 (208 + 4% per level) damage, silencing and slowing them for 30% for 3 seconds. Only allows them to see a very short distance for 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Adaptation
abilities.description: After 5 seconds, heal for 60% of the damage you took over this period.

abilities.name: Black Soulstone
abilities.description: Gain 10 Souls per Hero killed, or 1 per Minion or captured Mercenary. For each Soul, gain .20% maximum Health. If you have 100 Souls upon dying, you resurrect in 5 seconds and lose 100 Souls.  Maximum 100 Souls.

abilities.name: Shadow Charge
abilities.description: Charge an enemy, knocking them back, dealing 206 (98 + 4% per level) damage, and then stunning them for 0.5 seconds. If the enemy collides with terrain, they are stunned for 1 second instead.

abilities.name: Fire Stomp
abilities.description: Unleashes fire waves in all directions that deal 233 (111 + 4% per level) damage each.

abilities.name: Overpower
abilities.description: Grabs the target and slams it behind Diablo, dealing 160 (76 + 4% per level) damage and stunning for 0.25 seconds.

abilities.name: Apocalypse
abilities.description: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 301 (143 + 4% per level) damage and stunning for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Lightning Breath
abilities.description: Become Unstoppable while channeling lightning that deals 1753 (832 + 4% per level) damage over 4 seconds.  The direction of the Lightning changes with your mouse cursor position.

abilities.name: Rockstar
abilities.description: When you use a Basic or Heroic ability, give 20% Attack Speed for 4 seconds to all nearby allied Heroes.

abilities.name: Powerslide
abilities.description: Slide to a location dealing 200 (95 + 4% per level) damage and stunning enemies hit for 1.25 second.

abilities.name: Face Melt
abilities.description: Deals 149 (71 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back.

abilities.name: Guitar Solo
abilities.description: Regenerate 145 (69 + 4% per level) Health per second for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Mosh Pit
abilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Stage Dive
abilities.description: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 724 (330 + 4% per level) damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Iron Skin
abilities.description: Gain a Shield that absorbs 1344 (638 + 4% per level) damage for 4 seconds. While this Shield is active, you are Unstoppable.

abilities.name: Punish
abilities.description: Step forward dealing 248 (118 + 4% per level) damage and slowing enemies by 60% decaying over 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Condemn
abilities.description: After 1 second, you pull nearby enemies toward you, stunning them for 0.25 seconds and dealing 121 (58 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Shield Glare
abilities.description: Deal 130 (62 + 4% per level) damage to enemies and cause them to miss Basic Attacks for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Falling Sword
abilities.description: You leap towards an area.  While in the air, you can steer the landing location by moving. After 2 seconds you land, dealing 800 (356 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and knocking them into the air.

abilities.name: Blessed Shield
abilities.description: Deal 250 (119 + 4% per level) damage and stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 125 (60 + 4% per level) damage and stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Undying
abilities.description: Become a ghost when you die, and resurrect upon reaching full Health. Your Abilities and Talents don't do damage while dead, but will still heal you for 50% of their normal amount, causing you to cheat death.

abilities.name: Ghastly Swing
abilities.description: Swing in front of you to slow enemies by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Skeletal Swing
abilities.description: Swing in front of you to deal 255 (121 + 4% per level) damage and slow enemies by 40% for 2.5 seconds. Deals double damage to non-Heroes and non-Structures.

abilities.name: Drain Essence
abilities.description: Throw out a chain, attaching to the first enemy Hero hit healing you for up to 12.5% of your maximum Health over 4 seconds as long as you remain close to the enemy. You drain more essence the longer you remain connected.

abilities.name: Drain Hope
abilities.description: Grab an enemy Hero's soul, dealing up to 20% of their maximum Health as damage and healing you for up to 20% of your maximum Health while you are nearby, over 4 seconds. You are slowed by 20% while this is active.

abilities.name: Wraith Walk
abilities.description: Separate from your body, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed accelerating up to 50% over 2.5 seconds. When Wraith Walk ends or is canceled, your body jumps to your wraith.

abilities.name: Entomb
abilities.description: Create an unpathable tomb in front of you for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: March of the Black King
abilities.description: Become Unstoppable and swing your mace three times, healing yourself for 7.03% of your maximum Health for each enemy Hero hit and dealing 401 (191 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Second Wind
abilities.description: Restore 112 (54 + 4% per level) Health per second when you have not taken damage for 4 seconds. When below 40% Health, increased to 224 (107 + 4% per level) Health per second.

abilities.name: Storm Bolt
abilities.description: Throw a hammer, dealing 242 (115 + 4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit and stunning it for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Thunder Clap
abilities.description: Deals 211 (100 + 4% per level) damage and slows enemies by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Dwarf Toss
abilities.description: Leap to target location, dealing 130 (62 + 4% per level) damage to enemies on landing.

abilities.name: Avatar
abilities.description: Transform for 20 seconds, gaining 2240 (1063 + 4% per level) Health and causing your Basic Attacks to stun enemies.

abilities.name: Haymaker
abilities.description: Stun target enemy Hero, and wind up a punch dealing 699 (332 + 4% per level) damage and knocking the target back, hitting enemies in the way for 699 (332 + 4% per level) damage and knocking them aside.

abilities.name: Misha, Follow!
abilities.description: Activate to command Misha to stay by your side.  If Misha dies, she will revive in 31 (15 + 4% per level) seconds.

abilities.name: Misha, Attack!
abilities.description: Activate to command Misha to attack your enemies.  If Misha dies, she will revive in 31 (15 + 4% per level) seconds.

abilities.name: Misha, Focus!
abilities.description: Command Misha to attack a specific enemy or move to a point and wait.

abilities.name: Spirit Swoop
abilities.description: Deal 309 (147 + 4% per level) damage to enemies in a line, slowing them by 30% for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Misha, Charge!
abilities.description: Misha charges in a line, dealing 130 (62 + 4% per level) damage and stunning enemies for 1.25 seconds.

abilities.name: Mend Pet
abilities.description: Heal Misha for 1305 (620 + 4% per level) Health over 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Bestial Wrath
abilities.description: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by 150% for 12 seconds.

abilities.name: Unleash the Boars
abilities.description: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 242 (115 + 4% per level) damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Fury
abilities.description: Use Fury instead of Mana, which is gained by taking or dealing damage. Using a Basic or Heroic Ability grants 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Ancient Spear
abilities.description: Throw out a spear that pulls you to the first enemy hit, dealing 380 (180 + 4% per level) damage and briefly stunning them. If this hits an enemy, generate 40 Fury.

abilities.name: Seismic Slam
abilities.description: Deals 421 (200 + 4% per level) damage to the target enemy, and 106 (50 + 4% per level) to enemies behind the target.

abilities.name: Whirlwind
abilities.description: Deals 875 (415 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies over 3 seconds, and heals for 20% of damage dealt. Healing tripled versus Heroes.

abilities.name: Leap
abilities.description: Leap into the air, dealing 270 (128 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Wrath of the Berserker
abilities.description: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of silences, stuns, slows, roots, and polymorphs against you by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

abilities.name: Vile Gas
abilities.description: When damaged, Stitches emits a gas cloud that persists for 4 seconds.  Enemies who enter it are poisoned for 40 (19 + 4% per level) damage per second for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Hook
abilities.description: Pull the first enemy hit towards you, temporarily stunning them and dealing 200 (95 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Slam
abilities.description: Deal 176 (84 + 4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: Deal 699 (332 + 4% per level) damage to Minions or 250 (119 + 4% per level) damage to Heroes. Restores 19.92% of your maximum Health.

abilities.name: Putrid Bile
abilities.description: Emit bile that deals 82 (39 + 4% per level) damage per second to enemies within, slowing them by 35%. You gain 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Gorge
abilities.description: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 601 (285 + 4% per level) damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources. Cannot be used on massive Heroes.

abilities.name: Archangel's Wrath
abilities.description: When you die, become invulnerable and explode for 1206 (572 + 4% per level) damage after 3.5 seconds.

abilities.name: El'Druin's Might
abilities.description: Deals 242 (115 + 4% per level) damage to enemies within target area, slowing them by 25%. Reactivating will teleport you to the blade and slow nearby enemies by 25%.

abilities.name: Righteousness
abilities.description: Shields you for 702 (33 + 4% per level) damage and nearby allies for 281 (134 + 4% per level) damage for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Smite
abilities.description: Rake target area for 316 (150 + 4% per level) damage. Allies moving through the targeted area gain 25% increased Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Judgment
abilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero dealing 220 (104 + 4% per level) damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 110 (52 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Sanctification
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Energy
abilities.description: Each time Zarya's Personal Barrier or Shield Ally absorbs 22 (11 + 4% per level) damage, her Energy is increased by 1. Each point of Energy increases Zarya's damage by 2%. After 0.5 seconds, Energy decays by 2.5 per second.

abilities.name: Particle Grenade
abilities.description: Launch a particle grenade that deals 156 (74 + 4% per level) damage to enemies within the area. Deals 50% damage to Structures.

abilities.name: Personal Barrier
abilities.description: Gain a shield that absorbs 1228 (583 + 4% per level) damage for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Shield Ally
abilities.description: Grants an allied Hero a shield that absorbs 921 (437 + 4% per level) damage for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Graviton Surge
abilities.description: Launch a gravity bomb that detonates after 1 second and draws enemy Heroes toward the center for 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Expulsion Zone
abilities.description: Launch a gravity bomb that deals 272 (129 + 4% per level) damage and creates an expulsion zone for 3.5 seconds. Enemies who enter the affected area are knocked back and have their Movement Speed reduced by 50% for 1 second.
